mapper.select: select * from (select c.c_no, c.pd_no as pd_no, c.userid as userid, c.price as price, c.discount as discount, c.shipping_c as shipping_c, c.num as num, c.o_value as o_value, p.pd_name as pd_name, p.s_no as s_no, p.main_img as main_img from cart c, product p where c.pd_no=p.pd_no) where userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(c_no, userid, pd_no, num, price, discount, shipping_c, o_value) values(c_sq.nextval, #{userid}, #{pd_no}, #{num}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{shipping_c}, #{o_value})
